meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or situated in the depths of the ocean.
meanings.sent1: The diver marveled at the byssal creatures living in the dark ocean depths.
meanings.sent2: The submarine explored the byssal region of the ocean floor.
meanings.sent3: The byssal fish threw a party in the deep sea, inviting all its friends.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were as byssal as the mysterious ocean depths, unfathomable and profound.
meanings.sent5: The byssal blue of the ocean at night was both beautiful and eerie.
